app_store_metadata.subtitle: Voice-based, context-aware AI tutor
app_store_metadata.description:
Scaffold is an intelligent AI tutor that uses voice interaction and screen awareness to provide personalized learning assistance. Simply speak your questions while looking at any content on your screen, and Scaffold will provide contextual, helpful responses.

Key Features:
• Voice-based interaction - just speak your questions
• Screen-aware AI that understands what you're looking at
• Real-time audio responses
• Secure authentication and usage tracking
• Works with any content on your screen

Perfect for students, professionals, and lifelong learners who want an intelligent assistant that can help them understand any content they're working with.

version_info.whats_new: Initial release of Scaffold - your voice-based AI tutor that understands your screen content and provides intelligent assistance through natural conversation.

app_review_info.notes: This app requires microphone and screen recording permissions to function. The app will request these permissions on first launch. No personal data is stored locally - all processing is done securely through our API.
